body.subtitle: My collection of notes on xslt, helpful snippets and ideas for the future

text.para: This site is build using XML and XSLT as an expermient. It is inteneded to have the xml files built by combining various differnet files at request time. I will be looking into some form of caching to only regen if the input files are editied. and have things like includes (css) and menu (navbar) are definied in seaprate file.
